00040 #ifndef _physactorrigid_cpp
00041 #define _physactorrigid_cpp
00042 
00043 #include "btBulletDynamicsCommon.h"
00044 #include "BulletSoftBody/btSoftRigidDynamicsWorld.h"
00045 #include "BulletCollision/CollisionShapes/btShapeHull.h"
00046 #include "BulletCollision/Gimpact/btGImpactShape.h"

00048 #include "actorrigid.h"
00049 #include "internalmotionstate.h.cpp" // This is required for the internal physmotionstate :(

00051 namespace phys{
00052     ///////////////////////////////////
00053     // ActorRigid class functions
00054 
00055     ActorRigid::ActorRigid (Real mass, String name, String file, String group, World* _World) : ActorBase (name, file, group, _World)
00056     {
00057         this->CreateRigidObject(mass);
00058     }
00059 
00060     ActorRigid::~ActorRigid ()
00061     {
00062         delete physrigidbody;
00063     }
00064 
00065     void ActorRigid::CreateRigidObject (Real pmass)
00066     {
00067         btScalar bmass=pmass;
00068         this->physrigidbody = new btRigidBody (bmass, this->MotionState, this->Shape);
00069         CollisionObject=physrigidbody;
00070     }
00071 
00072     void ActorRigid::AddObjectToWorld (World *TargetWorld, btSoftRigidDynamicsWorld* btWorld)
00073     {
00074         btWorld->addRigidBody(this->physrigidbody);
00075         AttachToGraphics();
00076     }
00077 
00078     void ActorRigid::CreateShapeFromMeshDynamic(short unsigned int accuracy)
00079     {
00080         if(accuracy==1)
00081         {
00082             delete Shape;
00083             /// @todo - Check for thread safety
00084             btConvexShape *tmpshape = new btConvexTriangleMeshShape(this->CreateTrimesh());
00085             btShapeHull *hull = new btShapeHull(tmpshape);
00086             btScalar margin = tmpshape->getMargin();
00087             hull->buildHull(margin);
00088             tmpshape->setUserPointer(hull);
00089             btConvexHullShape* convexShape = new btConvexHullShape();
00090             for (int b=0;b<hull->numVertices();b++)
00091             {
00092                 convexShape->addPoint(hull->getVertexPointer()[b]);
00093             }
00094             delete tmpshape;
00095             delete hull;
00096             btScalar mass=this->physrigidbody->getInvMass();
00097             mass=1/mass;
00098             btVector3 inertia(0,0,0);
00099             convexShape->calculateLocalInertia(mass, inertia);
00100             Shape = convexShape;
00101             this->Shape->setLocalScaling(btVector3(0.95,0.95,0.95));
00102             this->physrigidbody->setCollisionShape(this->Shape);
00103             this->physrigidbody->setMassProps(mass,inertia);
00104             return;
00105         }
00106         if(accuracy==2)
00107         {
00108             delete Shape;
00109             /// @todo add code here to increase the verticies that is used to create the hull from the first accuracy setting.
00110             btConvexShape *tmpshape = new btConvexTriangleMeshShape(this->CreateTrimesh());
00111             Shape=tmpshape;
00112             this->physrigidbody->setCollisionShape(this->Shape);
00113             return;
00114         }
00115         if(accuracy==3)
00116         {
00117             delete Shape;
00118             /// @todo add code here for compound shapes of convex hulls
00119             this->physrigidbody->setCollisionShape(this->Shape);
00120             return;
00121         }
00122         if(accuracy==4)
00123         {
00124             delete Shape;
00125             btGImpactMeshShape* gimpact = new btGImpactMeshShape(this->CreateTrimesh());
00126             btScalar mass=this->physrigidbody->getInvMass();
00127             mass=1/mass;
00128             btVector3 inertia(0,0,0);
00129             gimpact->calculateLocalInertia(mass, inertia);
00130             gimpact->setLocalScaling(btVector3(1.f,1.f,1.f));
00131             gimpact->setMargin(0.04);
00132             gimpact->updateBound();
00133             Shape=gimpact;
00134             this->physrigidbody->setCollisionShape(this->Shape);
00135             this->physrigidbody->setMassProps(mass,inertia);
00136             return;
00137         }
00138         return;
00139     }
00140 
00141     void ActorRigid::CreateShapeFromMeshStatic()
00142     {
00143         delete Shape;
00144 
00145         /// @todo - Check for thread safety
00146         btBvhTriangleMeshShape *tmpshape = new btBvhTriangleMeshShape(this->CreateTrimesh(),true);
00147         this->Shape=tmpshape;
00148         this->Shape->setLocalScaling(btVector3(0.95,0.95,0.95));
00149         this->physrigidbody->setCollisionShape(this->Shape);
00150     }
00151 
00152     void ActorRigid::LimitMovementOnAxis(bool x, bool y, bool z)
00153     {
00154         btVector3 LinFact(x,y,z);
00155         this->physrigidbody->setLinearFactor(LinFact);
00156         return;
00157     }
00158 }
